metadata.title: CVE-2015-5338 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerabilities in the lessonmodule in Moodle through 2.6.11, 2.7.x before 2.7.11, 2.8.x before 2.8.9,and 2.9.x before 2.9.3 allow remote attackers to hijack the authenticationof arbitrary users for requests to (1) mod/lesson/mediafile.php or (2)mod/lesson/view.php.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
